All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeCounterStore, IAeStorage
public class AeSQLCounterStore
extends AeSQLObject
implements IAeCounterStore

Implements persistent counter store in the database.

getSQLStatement

protected java.lang.String getSQLStatement(java.lang.String aStatementName)
                                    throws AeStorageException
Returns a SQL statement from the SQL configuration object. This convenience method prepends the name of the statement with "Counter.".

Parameters:
aStatementName - The name of the statement, such as "GetCounterValue".
Returns:
The SQL statement found for that name.
Throws:
AeStorageException - If the SQL statement is not found.
